expected_behaviors: Reads backlog directory|Identifies unblocked tickets|Presents ticket list to CEO|Caps at 3 tickets max
Builds only the specified tickets|Does not include other unblocked tickets|Spawns parallel build agents
Routes to sprint|Identifies unblocked tickets from backlog|Presents plan for parallel execution
Routes to sprint|Finds MVP-priority tickets|Proposes parallel build

prompt: Run /solopreneur:sprint with all tickets blocked or done
